chart.title: Global Hunger Index
chart.subtitle: The [Global Hunger Index](#dod:global-hunger-index) tries to capture the multidimensional nature of hunger by calculating an index score from four key hunger indicators. It is measured on a 100-point scale where 0 is the best score (no hunger) and 100 is the worst.
